TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Lifetime extends System.Object

remarks.format:
## Remarks This optional element is used in `wst:RequestSecurityToken` or `wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse` messages to indicate the desired or required lifetime of a token. All times are specified in UTC time.
[!INCLUDE[wif_wstrust_ref](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.DateTime created, valuetype System.DateTime expires) cil managed

Docs.param: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the token creation time in UTC.
A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the token expiration time in UTC.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified creation and expiration time.
Docs.exception: The time specified by occurs before the time specified by .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype System.DateTime> created, valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype System.DateTime> expires) cil managed

Docs.param: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the token creation time in UTC. Can be .
A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the token expiration time in UTC. Can be .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified creation and expiration time.
Docs.exception: The time specified by occurs before the time specified by .

Docs.summary: Gets the token creation time in UTC time.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the UTC time at which the token is created. Can be .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Represents the `<wst:Created>` child element. This optional element specifies the time at which the token is created.
[!INCLUDE[wif_wstrust_ref](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]

Docs.summary: Gets the token expiration time in UTC time.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the UTC time at which the token expires. Can be .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Represents the `<wst:Expires>` child element. This optional element specifies the time at which the token expires.
[!INCLUDE[wif_wstrust_ref](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
